Forms and Permits
=================

### Please select from the forms below:

* [Building Permit Application](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/2024-Building-Permit-Application.pdf)
* [Committee Member Application 2025](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/Committee-Member-Application-2025.pdf)
* [Public Information Request Form 2025](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/Public-Information-Request-Form.pdf)
* [RIGHT-OF-WAY (ROW) Permit Application](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/ROW-Application-detail.pdf)
* [Special Use Permit-Short Term Rental Application and Checklist](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/Ord.-ToRV-Special-Use-Permit-Short-Term-Rental-App-Checklist-2025.pdf)
* [Special Event Application - Fee Schedule](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/TRV-special-event-application.pdf)

**New V.M.U.D #2 Applications: Please review the new V.M.U.D. #2 Applications to be approved and signed by the General Manager at V.M.U.D.#2**

* [VMUD2 Permit Program](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/VMUD2-Permit-Program.pdf)
* [VMUD2 Residential Grading an Drainage Plan Requirements](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/VMUD2-Residential-Grading-and-Drainage-Plan-Requirements.pdf)
* [VMUD2 New Home/Addition Permit](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/VMUD2-New-Home-Addition-Permit.pdf)
* [VMUD2 Driveway Permit](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/VMUD2-Driveway-Permit.pdf)
* [VMUD2 Irrigation Permit](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/06/VMUD2-Irrigation-Permit.pdf)
* [VMUD#2 New Sprinkler System Permit with Ordinance](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/VMUD2-New-Sprinkler-System-Permit-with-Ordinance.pdf)
* [VMUD2 Seawall-Dock Permit](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/VMUD2-Seawall-Dock-Permit.pdf)

### Watch List

Courtesy of the Town of Rancho Viejo and handled by the police department, it is our pleasure to assist your friends and neighbors in watching your house or property while you are away.

[Download Watch List Form](https://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/pdf/watch.pdf)

### See Something that Needs Fixing?

We want to know when something needs fixing. Please fill out the following form, marking off any of the items that you know of or have seen that need to be fixed.

[Download Repair Form](http://www.ranchoviejotexas.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/FIXING-LETTER-FORM.pdf)

[Sign Up For Alerts](https://www.citizenobserver.com/registration.jsp)

Receive alerts from the Town Hall and local law enforcement about town meetings, crimes, emergencies and other important information.

All Alerts are delivered via e-mail and are also available via text message on your cell phone.
